title: Atty Cocktail Recipe
full_text:
Atty Cocktail Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
gin
(see note)
3/4
ounce
dry vermouth
1/4 to 1/2
teaspoon
absinthe
(see note)
1/4 to 1/2
teaspoon
crème de violette
(see note)
Lemon twist
, for garnish
Directions
Pour gin, vermouth, absinthe, and crème de violette into an ice-filled. Stir until well chilled, about 20 seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass, add lemon twist, and serve immediately.
Special equipment
Mixing glass, strainer, chilled cocktail glass
Gin
